text: The 2016 Colonial Athletic Association men's soccer season was the 34th season of men's varsity soccer in the conference. Hofstra Pride are the defending regular season and tournament champions. == Teams == === Stadia and locations === {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" ! Team ! Location ! Stadium !
